column1: Funeral services will be conducted 11:00 a.m. Monday
column3: 2015 at New Beginnings Baptist Church by Rev. Bobby Brumfield. Burial will follow at the First Baptist Church of Evington Cemetery. The family will receive friends from 7 to 8:00 p.m. Sunday
column5: 2015 at Colbert-Moran Funeral Home and other times will be at the residence of his son and daughter-in-law
